messageArea.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to send messages

createModal.description: Fill in the details to create your community
createModal.imageError: Please select a valid image file
createModal.imageSizeError: Image size should be less than 5MB
createModal.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 3 characters

notMember.title: Access Denied
notMember.message: You are not a member of {clanName}
notMember.description: Only clan members can access this chat.

notAuthenticated.title: Authentication Required
notAuthenticated.message: Please log in to access this clan
notAuthenticated.description: You need to be logged in to view clan chats.

membershipCheckFailed.title: Unable to Verify Membership
membershipCheckFailed.message: Could not verify your clan membership
membershipCheckFailed.description: Please try again later or contact support.

default.title: Access Restricted
default.message: You cannot access this clan chat

myCommunities.title: My Communities
myCommunities.subtitle: Manage and explore all your communities
myCommunities.emptyDescription: Join or create your first community to get started!

photo.title: Community Photo
photo.description: Upload or update your community photo
photo.dragDrop: Drag and drop an image here, or click to select

members.title: Member Management
members.description: Manage your community members and their roles
members.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this member?

ownership.title: Transfer Ownership
ownership.description: Transfer community ownership to another admin or member
ownership.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone
ownership.warningDesc: Transferring ownership will make the selected user the new owner and you will lose owner privileges.
ownership.selectMemberError: Please select a member to transfer ownership to
ownership.noEligibleMembers: No eligible members to transfer ownership to
ownership.needAnotherMember: Community must have at least one other member
ownership.keepAsAdminDesc: Remain as an admin after transferring ownership
ownership.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to transfer ownership to
ownership.fullControl: Will have full control over all settings

permissions.ownerOnly: Only the community owner or admins can access this setting
permissions.adminOnly: Only admins and owner can access this setting
permissions.unauthorized: You don't have permission to access this page
